body_text:
I've been getting this on multiple branches both locally and in CI. I suspect either something in mozilla-central changed, or one of the PRs we merged without CI because of #757 was actually bad.
The following tests failed:
418 INFO TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | browser/extensions/shield-recipe-client/test/browser/browser_PreferenceExperiments.js | A promise chain failed to handle a rejection: Cannot stop preference experiment "test" because it is already expired - rejection date: Wed May 31 2017 18:42:12 GMT+0000 (UTC) - stack: null - false == true - JS frame :: resource://testing-common/PromiseTestUtils.jsm :: assertNoUncaughtRejections :: line 257
Stack trace:
    resource://testing-common/PromiseTestUtils.jsm:assertNoUncaughtRejections:257
    chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:Tester.prototype.nextTest<:445
    testScope/test_finish/<@chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:1063:11
    run@chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:1000:9
419 INFO TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | browser/extensions/shield-recipe-client/test/browser/browser_PreferenceExperiments.js | A promise chain failed to handle a rejection: Cannot stop preference experiment "test" because it is already expired - rejection date: Wed May 31 2017 18:42:12 GMT+0000 (UTC) - stack: null - false == true - JS frame :: resource://testing-common/PromiseTestUtils.jsm :: assertNoUncaughtRejections :: line 257

title: Cannot stop preference experiment "test" because it is already expired
body:
I've been getting this on multiple branches both locally and in CI. I suspect either something in mozilla-central changed, or one of the PRs we merged without CI because of #757 was actually bad.

```
The following tests failed:
418 INFO TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | browser/extensions/shield-recipe-client/test/browser/browser_PreferenceExperiments.js | A promise chain failed to handle a rejection: Cannot stop preference experiment "test" because it is already expired - rejection date: Wed May 31 2017 18:42:12 GMT+0000 (UTC) - stack: null - false == true - JS frame :: resource://testing-common/PromiseTestUtils.jsm :: assertNoUncaughtRejections :: line 257
Stack trace:
    resource://testing-common/PromiseTestUtils.jsm:assertNoUncaughtRejections:257
    chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:Tester.prototype.nextTest<:445
    testScope/test_finish/<@chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:1063:11
    run@chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:1000:9
419 INFO TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | browser/extensions/shield-recipe-client/test/browser/browser_PreferenceExperiments.js | A promise chain failed to handle a rejection: Cannot stop preference experiment "test" because it is already expired - rejection date: Wed May 31 2017 18:42:12 GMT+0000 (UTC) - stack: null - false == true - JS frame :: resource://testing-common/PromiseTestUtils.jsm :: assertNoUncaughtRejections :: line 257
Stack trace:
    resource://testing-common/PromiseTestUtils.jsm:assertNoUncaughtRejections:257
    chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:Tester.prototype.nextTest<:445
    testScope/test_finish/<@chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:1063:11
    run@chrome://mochikit/content/browser-test.js:1000:9
Buffered messages finished
```
